data.name: Big Byz Wars
data.detailed_description:
Run'n'Gun in a dystopian sci-fi 2.5D side-scroller.
In the near future, mankind has created flying cities as a safe haven from viruses, environmental disasters, and terrorism.
The player will feel himself in the shoes of a mercenary equipped with a special combat suit with built-in Artificial Intelligence.
Defending the interests of the largest and most influential of the Earth's flying cities - Byzantium, also known as "Big Byz", the hero will have to solve several delicate tasks and missions.
data.about_the_game:
Run'n'Gun in a dystopian sci-fi 2.5D side-scroller.
In the near future, mankind has created flying cities as a safe haven from viruses, environmental disasters, and terrorism.
The player will feel himself in the shoes of a mercenary equipped with a special combat suit with built-in Artificial Intelligence.
Defending the interests of the largest and most influential of the Earth's flying cities - Byzantium, also known as "Big Byz", the hero will have to solve several delicate tasks and missions.
data.short_description: Run'n'Gun in dystopian sci-fi 2.5D side scroller. As a mercenary of the biggest flying city - Byzantium aka 'Big Byz', you will deal with some delicate issues and missions.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: core i7 or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: ryzen 3700 or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2000 series or faster
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
